participant_1.background:
I once lived in a storage locker for two months.
I am a recovering alcoholic.
I make pottery.
I have appeared on the show jeopardy.
I like to refurbish classic cars.

participant_2.background:
I like to write poetry.
When i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I used to be in the marines.
I work as a bartender.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write poetry, read books, and go out with friends.
Oh, that sounds nice. I like to refurbish classic cars, make pottery, and play Jeopardy!
Wow, that's really cool! I've never been on Jeopardy!
It was a lot of fun! I won a few thousand dollars.
That's awesome! I'm sure it was a great experience.
It was! I've always been a big fan of the show, so it was really cool to be on it.
I can imagine! So, what's your favorite thing about refurbishing classic cars?
I love the process of taking a broken-down car and turning it into a beautiful work of art. It's really rewarding to see your hard work come to fruition.
That sounds really cool! I've always thought it would be fun to learn how to do that.
It's not as hard as you might think. There are a lot of resources available online and in libraries.
I might have to look into that. It sounds like it could be a fun hobby.
It is! And it's a great way to learn about how cars work.
That's a good point. I've never been very good at fixing cars, but I think I could get the hang of it.
I'm sure you could! And if you ever need any help, I'm always here.
